issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Current the ti.map module always shows the annotation titles. This makes the map view look very messy. 

The title should be displayed when an annotation is clicked, like on Android or iOS
fields.summary: Windows: ti.map - add support for showing annotation title when clicked

comments.body:
Hello,
Thanks for your enquiry. At present {{ti.map}} module does not support Windows platform. If you want to use map on Windows Phone you will have to make your own module.
Thanks

Thank you for the feedback.

Are there no plans of implementing map functionality equivalent to ti.map on Android or iOS? 
I heard a rumour that the map functionality would be implemented within the SDK for windows (as opposed to in a separate module). 
Do you know anything more about this?
